Judul: ANALYSIS OPTIMUM FORECASTING METHOD AT Z HOSPITAL IN PEKANBARU
Abstrak:
Z Hospital is a class D hospital in Pekanbaru City. Along with the increasing number of patients 

in Z Hospital, the service system must be improved to maintain customerÃ‚Â’s loyalty to always 

entrust Z Hospital as a place of treatment. One of the facilities that affects the patientÃ‚Â’s trust is 

the Pharmacy Installation facility. Based on data, there is an increasing number of patients at Z 

Hospital, especially BPJS patients. However, in terms of financial, Z Hospital has decrease in 

revenue. Therefore, Z Hospital wants to reduce cost of medicine purchasing which is one of the 

largest cost in Z Hospital. Z Hospital has efficiency target of 10% from medicines purchasing 

cost. Currently Z Hospital does not yet have an accurate medicine forecasting system, so the 

medicines purchasing is often excessive and burden the warehouse. Therefore, a more accurate 

medicine forecasting system is needed and does not burden hospital warehouse. 

The analysis of medicine purchase forecasting was carried out using 5 methods, which is Linear 

Regression, Simple Moving Average, Weight Moving Average, Decomposition, and Holt's 

Exponential Smoothing for the next 12 months period. Calculations were performed for each 

medicine using the five methods regarding to amount of medicine purchased, medicines 

purchasing cost, average inventory, and level of accuracy denoted by MAD and MAPE. Based 

on the calculation, it is found that Holt's Exponential Smoothing method has the best accuracy 

level compared with other methods, with MAPE of 4.02% and MAD of 31.83%. From the cost 

aspect, the Weight Moving Average method produces the lowest cost, which is Rp. 746.005.787. 

While from the average inventory aspect, it is obtained the smallest value of average amount of 

medicines stored in warehouse is 23,245 units of medicines using Weight Moving Average 

method. 

The selection of appropriate medicines forecasting method is determined using Analytical 

Hierarcy Process (AHP). From the AHP results, it is found that the best method for medicines 

purchase forecasting in Z Hospital is Holt's method. By using Holt's method, it is obtained cost 

savings value of medicine purchase for the next 12 months is Rp. 196.145.862 (19.02% of actual 

purchase plan). The result shows that Holt's Exponential Smoothing method can reduce cost of 

purchasing medicines from the cost reduction target, which is 10%.
Kata Kunci: hospital, forecasting method, medicine purchasing, analytical hierarchy process.
